comment_body: Is there anything better than a Christmas vengeance story? Wonderful stuff.
Very eerily well done. I like the pov of the story. I love how it's left to me todecide what happened to the narratorand who exactly he is watching. This is really great. Merry Christmas!!!
whooa bro this is WHACK n i love it. HO HO HO
Merry Christmas to you! Exactly what I was going for, thanks for reading!
I think the stalker is skin walker and the other guy is a wendigo who is friendly
